SELECT p.id, p.`name`, p.unit, p.place, p.scale, p.role, p.money, p.`handler`, i.summary_project_id, i.id, i.stage, i.problem, i.probability, i.`opponent`, i.next_stage, i.working, i.time, ( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT( `name` ) FROM summary_staff s WHERE s.summary_project_id = p.id AND role = 0 ) AS contact, ( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT( `name` ) FROM summary_staff s WHERE s.summary_project_id = p.id AND role = 1 ) AS tracker, p.handler = #{id} as permission
FROM summary_project p LEFT JOIN summary_project_information i on p.id = i.summary_project_id GROUP BY p.id ORDER BY i.time DESC
